Google Inc. . Chief Executive Officer Eric Schmidt . Photographer: Tony Avelar/Bloomberg Eric Schmidt said he is "committed to Google Inc. " and that he agrees with co-founders Sergey Brin on "everything." He said he will stay at Google Inc. as long as it is exciting. Eric Schmidt spoke to reporters in Munich today. Eric Schmidt , who will be replaced as CEO by Page on April 4, said the transition will not affect decision-making at the company.

NBA's Most Valuable Player in 2001, agreed to a$ 4 million, two-year deal with Besiktas after no NBA team offered him a contract. Gary Moore said Allen Iverson last played Saturday.
